critique: The document aims to evoke a sense of safety and responsibility. The primary emotion is joy that lives will be saved and injuries reduced. There is also an element of fear regarding the dangers of texting while driving, which the order seeks to alleviate. Sadness is present due to the past incidents that prompted the order. Surprise is minimal, as the issue is a known problem. Disgust is also minimal. The tone is serious and authoritative, reflecting the importance of the issue.
